alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 4:27PM CDT until August 18 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tyler County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Hardin County in southeastern Texas... Southeastern Jasper County in southeastern Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Caney Head, or near Fred, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buna, Evadale, Fred and Caney Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
